content:
This project is under active development and the code will likely change pretty significantly. We'll update this message once that's complete! More broadly we welcome contributions – whether you are opening your very first pull request or you’re a seasoned maintainer. At the same time we care about reliability and long‑term maintainability, so the bar for merging code is intentionally
high
. The guidelines below spell out what “high‑quality” means in practice and should make the whole process transparent and friendly.
